Fade From Vision

A single target during combat is unable to see you. You are visible, but their eyes won't communicate to the brain what they see. That target is penalized six dice on all tests against you. It takes a complex action to switch targets. Out of combat, you can be detected by an Observation test, versus your Shadow test. You must be able to see your target to vanish from their vision.
